content: On the way to our <style=Highlight>planet</style>, the view was just incredible~! Every place has its own unique... vibe!
info: 采集苹果-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: Anyway, Mobai said, "Supporting the planet just wouldn't be possible without Sani"! <style=SizeSmall>But honestly, I think the two of them would handle things pretty well.</style>

content: {A想象}I heard some planets are full of swirling sandstorms, some have snowy blizzards, some have gigantic plants, and some even have colorful rivers!
info: 采集苹果-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: I used to spend my time cruisin' all over the Starsea, but now? My latest mission is helping you nurture your planet~!
info: 采集苹果-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: What's next after you've completed your "latest mission"?
info: 采集苹果-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A点头}Not for now, at least. Mobai says starting fresh takes all kinds of help, and, according to him, it'd all fall apart without me!
info: 采集苹果-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A两眼放光}I want to travel to more interesting places with you in the future! I want to help Glenn with deliveries! And invite more friends over to hang out too!

content: I heard that some berries and flowers... {A一愣}can make your mouth go numb from the spiciness?!{短暂停} Isn't that super duper wild?

content: So, no more Starsea Voyaging for you?
info: 采集苹果-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: But I didn't stay for those two. I stayed for... for...{短暂停} for you! After all, protecting you is my top priority. Yeee swoosh~!
info: 采集苹果-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: {A惊讶}Huh?! W-Wait... was all that just reverse psychology to get me to join?!

content: If you don't know what to do, just talk to Mobai. If you're looking to buy or sell goods, go see Glenn. {A得意}And if you're bored, just come see me!
info: 采集苹果-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: I swear on these boing-tastic ears of mine~, I'll show you what real danger — Ahem...
info: 采集苹果-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: Wait, no — I mean, I'll keep you safe while we're out and about! <style=SizeSmall>The look Mobai just shot my way was... super duper wild...</style>

content: Mobai says if we take good care of our planet, we'll see all kinds of amazing landscapes, and even the starry sky will get all dreamy...

content: {A灵光一现}Ahh, I just can't stop thinking about it... but for now, we gotta finish tidying up. I'll go check 'em out, swoosh~! One day!

content: It's fine, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>. Mobai totally knows how to take care of a planet. Let's work together and make this place shine!

content: {A疑惑}But, I mean... around here, uh... There are no flowers, not even a strand of wildgrass!
